name: Application Auto Scaling
short: Automatically scale Amazon EC2, Amazon ECS, and other AWS services based on your application's resource needs.
description: AWS Application Auto Scaling is a service that automatically scales applications based on user-defined criteria. It allows users to scale the applications to meet changing demands, ensuring high availability and performance. It can be used to scale resources like EC2 instances, DynamoDB tables and indexes, Lambda functions, and Aurora replicas. It also supports predictive scaling, allowing users to define how much capacity they need at a given time. With Application Auto Scaling, users can maximize the performance of their applications at a lower cost.
